author: chamikara
msg: A new exception SandeshaStorageException is thrown from the storage framework.
Some modifications to the bean manager interfaces.
The 'velue' property of the SequencePRopertyBean manager was made a String (instead of an object), for allowing it to be saved in a database easily.

msg: hrm.  my usegpg->gpg change didn't make it in the last commit. :(

author: felicity
msg: accept either gpg key id (8 byte) or fingerprint (40 byte), default to using gpg but allow --no-gpg, update which gpg keys we accept by default
